summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 13th Avenue South, from Charlestown Street to Spokane street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with property owner's petition being City Comptrollers File No. 193813 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
